channel.title: Missing User Interface (Health Meter, Weapons, etc.)
channel.description: All of the user interface items such as the Health meter, the weapons menu, the flash light and even the crosshair for the guns are missing. Help!

item.title: Missing User Interface (Health Meter, Weapons, etc.)

item.description:
All of the user interface items such as the Health meter, the weapons menu, the flash light and even the crosshair for the guns are missing. Help!
